question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies across different platforms over the last year.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Retrieve the list of companies along with their social media engagements from different platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube).","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":2,"task":"Filter the engagement data to include only records from the last year","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":3,"task":"Aggregate the data to calculate total engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) for each company on each platform over the last year.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Generate visualizations or reports that compare social media engagement trends across the companies and different platforms.","table":["CompanyInfo"]}]
